name: Cake Clicker - Idle Game
description:
Game Developed for HLG Jam!

A Fun Little Idle Game, Bake And Sell Them To Make Money!

Hope you enjoy the game, and leave your Feedback!

Jogo Desenvolvido para a HLG Jam!

Espero que goste do Jogo, e deixe seu Feedback!
